page.title: 02AN INTERVIEW WITH A RESIDENT
page.content: 1 WOULD YOU RATHER LIVE IN OR OUT OF TOWN ?{ {I WOULD RATHER LIVE IN TOWN. 2 DO YOU MIND LIVING BY THE MAIN ROAD? { IT IS A BIT NOISY BUT I PUT UP WITH { IT AS THE NOISE DIES DOWN AT 11 pm. 3 WAS IT AN EASY AREA TO MOVE INTO ? { YES,IT WAS. 4 ARE THERE MANY BREAK-INS IN YOUR AREA ?{ { NO,NOT MANY. 5 DO YOU HAVE ANY TROUBLE WITH THE PEOPLE FROM 'TINTOWN' ?{ { NO,WE DON'T HAVE ANY TROUBLE FROM { 'TINTOWN'.SOMETIMES WE HAVE TROUBLE { FROM PASSERS-BY. 6 DO YOU USE THE LOCAL SHOPS MUCH ? { I PREFER TO GO TO TOWN. 7 IS IT A BETTER NEIGHBOURHOOD NOW THAN IT WAS WHEN YOU FIRST MOVED IN ? { IT WAS A BETTER NEIGHBOURHOOD WHEN { WE FIRST CAME 12 YEARS AGO. }
